name: d365-modalandmore
author: Gareth Cheyne err403.com
description: TypeScript UI utility library for Dynamics 365 CE - Toast notifications, Modal dialogs with tabs, and more

scripts.build: vite build && (npx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly || true) && npx rollup -c rollup.dts.config.js && cp build/ui-lib.min.js release/ && cp build/ui-lib.min.js.map release/ && cp build/ui-lib.types.d.ts release/ui-lib.types.d.ts.js && cp README.md release/README.md.html && cp assets/logo.svg release/ && cp assets/brand.svg release/
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:pages
scripts.release: npm run build:all && npm run update-solution && npm run pack-solution
scripts.deploy: npm run build:all && npm run update-solution && node scripts/pac-deploy.js deploy
